name: The Crazies Show
description:
YOU ARE THE PRESENTER OF THE GREATEST GAME SHOW OF ALL TIME (AND THE DEADLIEST TOO) YOUR JOB IS TO KILL AS MANY PARTICIPANTS BEFORE THE TIMER RUNS OUT. HOWEVER, IF THEY ESCAPE YOU WILL LOSE AUDIENCE.

YOU'LL HAVE 2 DIFFERENT KINDS OF TOOLS TO SUCCEED. THE TOP ONES ARE ACTIVATABLE, WHICH MEANS YOU'LL HAVE TO CLICK ON THEM TO ACTIVATE. ON THE OTHER HAND, THE BOTTOM ONES ARE "PASSIVE", YOU CAN LAY THEM ON THE GROUND AND THEY WILL DO THEIR JOB. YOU CAN ONLY DEPLOY 5 OF EACH KIND, SO PLACE THEM WISELY. IF YOU WANT TO REMOVE ONE AND  REPLACE IT SIMPLY CLICK ON TOP OF THE BLOCK WHERE THEY ARE LOCATED.

TO UNLOCK THE DEADLIER TOOLS ONES OBTAIN MORE AUDIENCE.
